text: This mod's mechanics change depending on whether the Plants and/or Zombies are on normal blocks or water.
$(br2)For a Plant to be planted on water it either needs the Amphibious/Aquatic trait, or to be planted on top of a Lily Pad.
$(br2)Some plants work differently depending on whether they are on land or water.
$(br2)When Zombies enter water, they will start swimming. When a Zombie is swimming, they can't use movement-based abilities (like Tackle)
$(br2)Chill slows down swimming zombies, while a Freeze kills the Zombie if it's swimming and it's not a Gargantuar. Zombies on water are immune to fire damage and will prevent fire splash.
$(br2)If the body of water is only one block deep (including the block of water itself), the zombies will go through it, entering swimming mode,
but if it's deeper, the zombies will more likely go around it, keep this in mind when using water.
